version_description:
Thank you for using the Kolibree app!
Several bugs have been fixed to ensure that you’ll have a smoother and more stable experience. Enjoy !

If you like Kolibree, let the world know ! Please rate us and leave a comment in the App Store.
We constantly modify and update our app to deliver the greatest brushing experience, do not miss any updates by activating the automatic app update.

Please let us know if you discover any bug in the app, we appreciate your feedback!

See you later !

Please let us know if you discover any bug in the app, we appreciate your feedback!

See you later !

Thank you for using the Kolibree app!
Here are the newest functions released with this version:

* Sync' Notifications *
If you are the only user of your toothbrush and have set up -single user brushing- in the application, then you will now receive occasional notifications to remind you to synchronize your data with the app.

* Reminders Removed *
Because sometimes less is more: we have removed the old reminder function.

* Fixed Bugs *
A lot of bugs have been fixed to ensure that you’ll have a smoother and more stable experience. Enjoy!

If you like Kolibree, let the world know: rate us and leave a comment in the App Store!
We constantly modify and update our app to deliver the greatest brushing experience to you. Do not miss any update and activate the automatic app update.

Please let us know if you discover any bug in the app, we do appreciate your feedback!

See you later!

- You can use multiple Ara toothbrushes with the same Kolibree app. Each Ara is associated with its own profile.
- You can use multiple Ara toothbrushes with the same Kolibree app. Each Ara is associated with its own profile.
Fixed bugs.
Fixed bugs.
Improvements and bug fixes.
Improvements and bug fixes.

Discover Coach+, our brand new 3D brushing experience
100% of surface coverage guaranteed!
It also comes with a redesigned Checkup screen.

Discover Coach+, our brand new 3D brushing experience
100% of surface coverage guaranteed!
It also comes with a redesigned Checkup screen.
Bug fix and stability improvement.
Bug fix and stability improvement.
Would you like to help improve the oral health of future generations? Join our research study powered by ResearchKit.
Would you like to help improve the oral health of future generations? Join our research study powered by ResearchKit.
Fixed an issue that affected connection to the proper server.
Fixed an issue that affected connection to the proper server.

A lot a new features in this version:
• New Home page with a fresh look
• Rabbids game, previously available as a standalone application, is directly integrated in the app
• A new family mode allows you to share your Ara toothbrush with the members of your family
• Global improvement of navigation and user experience
• Bug fixes and stability improvement
